markdown:
Baneback gripplis with innate magical ability may find themselves drawn to vile magic dealing with poison, vermin, and ill luck. Those who revel in the dreadful legends surrounding their kind often worship evil gods or demons associated with poison, tattooing themselves with mystic symbols to gain powerful control over toxins. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 [Grippli Jinxer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1624) **Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 83 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Grippli](/Languages.aspx?ID=48) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 **Items** [Dart](/Weapons.aspx?ID=68) (8), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) --- **AC** 23 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +14 **Will** +16 **HP** 95 **Hypnotic Tattoos** **Trigger** A [hostile](/Conditions.aspx?ID=23) creature targets the jinxer with a melee Strike; **Effect** Tattoos on the jinxer's body swirl and shift in mesmerizing patterns. The creature must attempt a DC 22 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
**Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Failure** The creature treats the jinxer as [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) until the end of its turn.
**Critical Failure** The creature treats the jinxer as [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) until the end of its turn. --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet; jungle stride **Melee** staff +14 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning plus baneback poison **Ranged** dart +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d4+6 piercing plus baneback poison **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 24, attack +16 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300) (3 slots) - **2nd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) (giant cockroach, giant fly, or giant tick only), [Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=726) (3 slots) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) (3 slots) **Baneback Poison** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 24; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d4 poison damage and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d4 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 4d4 poison damage, stupefied 3, and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round) **Curse of Baneful Venom** ([Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The jinxer magically intensifies toxins in their foes. Creatures within 30 feet of the jinxer that are currently afflicted by a [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) immediately attempt their next saving throw against the poison with a –2 status penalty, then are temporarily immune to Curse of Baleful Venom for 1 hour. **Jungle Stride** Gripplis ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles.
name: Grippli Jinxer

text: Grippli Jinxer Baneback gripplis with innate magical ability may find themselves drawn to vile magic dealing with poison, vermin, and ill luck. Those who revel in the dreadful legends surrounding their kind often worship evil gods or demons associated with poison, tattooing themselves with mystic symbols to gain powerful control over toxins. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Grippli Jinxer Source Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 83 Perception +16; darkvision Languages Common, Grippli Skills Acrobatics +14, Athletics +12, Intimidation +12, Nature +14, Occultism +10, Stealth +14 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +4 Cha +0 Items Dart (8), Staff --- AC 23 Fort +12 Ref +14 Will +16 HP 95 Hypnotic Tattoos Reaction Trigger A hostile creature targets the jinxer with a melee Strike; Effect Tattoos on the jinxer's body swirl and shift in mesmerizing patterns. The creature must attempt a DC 22 Will save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour. Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 minute. Failure The creature treats the jinxer as concealed until the end of its turn. Critical Failure The creature treats the jinxer as hidden until the end of its turn. --- Speed 25 feet, climb 20 feet; jungle stride Melee Single Action staff +14 (two-hand d8), Damage 1d4+6 bludgeoning plus baneback poison Ranged Single Action dart +16 (Agile, thrown 20 feet), Damage 1d4+6 piercing plus baneback poison Occult Spontaneous Spells DC 24, attack +16 - Cantrips (3rd) Chill Touch, Forbidding Ward, Know Direction, Shield, Telekinetic Projectile - 1st Bane, Ray of Enfeeblement, Spider Sting (3 slots) - 2nd Dispel Magic, Summon Animal (giant cockroach, giant fly, or giant tick only), Vomit Swarm (3 slots) - 3rd Blindness, Fear, Paralyze (3 slots) Baneback Poison (Poison) Saving Throw Fortitude DC 24; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 2d4 poison damage and stupefied 1 (1 round); Stage 2 3d4 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round); Stage 3 4d4 poison damage, stupefied 3, and flat-footed (1 round) Curse of Baneful Venom Three Actions (Necromancy, Occult) The jinxer magically intensifies toxins in their foes. Creatures within 30 feet of the jinxer that are currently afflicted by a poison immediately attempt their next saving throw against the poison with a –2 status penalty, then are temporarily immune to Curse of Baleful Venom for 1 hour. Jungle Stride Gripplis ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles.
